[i][b]The game is one of the biggest hits of all time, being very, very popular in the old Lan Houses of the early two thousand years. Coming up with the premise of being a modification of the already-consecrated Half Life, this first-person shooter game reached the stars. Having its latest version as the best selling game on Steam for months on end.

Having a simple premise of throwing some people into an arena to shoot each other to death, combined with a simple but fun gameplay, ensured the immediate success of this game.

In it, you can walk, jump, crouch, and shoot your enemies. Simple commands that ensure that anyone can learn to play and have fun for a long time.[/b][/i]
